original_title: The Lovers' Guide: Making Sex Even Better
overview: The world’s best selling sex guide. The Lovers’ Guide series were the first adult guides on video revealing interesting informative and entertaining aspects of love and sex in intimate relationships. The second film in the series explores an indepth range of sexual techniques and sensual methods to enrich your intimate lives. Creatively and effectively you will discover how to give and recieve lasting pleasure.
title: The Lovers' Guide: Making Sex Even Better
